title: The existing amenity can be allowed by the Municipal Commissioner to be retained and run by the Owner, then the owner shall be allowed to develop the remaining site, up to the full permissible FSI of the plot under reservation by taking into account the FSI utilised for the construction of the amenity building
clause_text: The existing amenity can be allowed by the Municipal Commissioner to be retained and run by the Owner, then the owner shall be allowed to develop the remaining site, up to the full permissible FSI of the plot under reservation by taking into account the FSI utilised for the construction of the amenity building.
section: General conditions to allow development under above regulations:-
